kv1.6:57.10: mano atthi dhammā atthi manoviññāṇaṃ atthi vatthuṃ atthi manasikāro atthi, paccuppannena manena paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv1.6:64.11: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:64.13: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:64.16: paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:64.18: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:65.1: Atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:65.3: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:65.6: atītaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:65.8: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:66.1: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:66.3: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti?
kv1.6:66.6: Anāgataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:66.8: Paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atthi, na ca tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
kv1.6:72.1: Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:72.3: Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:72.8: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:72.10: Arahato atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:73.1: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:73.3: Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:73.8: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:73.10: Anāgāmissa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:74.1: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:74.3: Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:74.7: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:74.9: Sakadāgāmissa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:75.1: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:75.3: Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:75.8: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:75.10: Sotāpannassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:76.1: Arahato atīto rāgo atthi, na ca arahā tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:76.3: Puthujjanassa atīto rāgo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena rāgena sarāgoti?
kv1.6:76.8: atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca arahā tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:76.10: Puthujjanassa atītaṃ anottappaṃ atthi, na ca puthujjano tena anottappena anottappīti?
kv1.6:77.1: Anāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca anāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:77.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:77.8: atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca anāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:77.10: Puthujjanassa atīto aṇusahagato byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:78.1: Sakadāgāmissa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:78.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:78.8: atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca sakadāgāmī tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:78.10: Puthujjanassa atīto oḷāriko byāpādo atthi, na ca puthujjano tena byāpādena byāpannacittoti?
kv1.6:79.1: Sotāpannassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca sotāpanno tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:79.3: Puthujjanassa atītā sakkāyadiṭṭhi atthi, na ca puthujjano tāya diṭṭhiyā sadiṭṭhikoti?
kv1.6:79.8: atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca sotāpanno tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:79.10: Puthujjanassa atīto apāyagamanīyo moho atthi, na ca puthujjano tena mohena samohoti?
kv1.6:81.18: Atītasmiṃ kucchismiṃ sati jighacchā pipāsā paññāyatīti?
kv1.6:82.3: Atīto kāyo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv1.6:82.6: atīte kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv1.6:82.9: labbhā atīto kāyo addubandhanena bandhituṃ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṃ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṃ, gāmabandhanena bandhituṃ, nigamabandhanena bandhituṃ, nagarabandhanena bandhituṃ, janapadabandhanena bandhituṃ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv1.6:85.1: Atīto rūpakkhandho atthi, anāgato rūpakkhandho atthi, paccuppanno rūpakkhandho atthīti?
kv1.6:85.6: atītā pañcakkhandhā atthi, anāgatā pañcakkhandhā atthi, paccuppannā pañcakkhandhā atthīti?
kv1.6:86.1: Atītaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ atthīti?
kv1.6:86.6: atītāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, anāgatāni dvādasāyatanāni atthi, paccuppannāni dvādasāyatanāni atthīti?
kv1.6:87.1: Atītā cakkhudhātu atthi, anāgatā cakkhudhātu atthi, paccuppannā cakkhudhātu atthīti?
kv1.6:87.6: atītā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, anāgatā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthi, paccuppannā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo atthīti?
kv1.6:88.1: Atītaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthi, paccuppannaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ atthīti?
kv1.6:88.6: atītāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, anāgatāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthi, paccuppannāni bāvīsatindriyāni atthīti?
kv1.6:89.1: Atīto rājā cakkavattī atthi, anāgato rājā cakkavattī atthi, paccuppanno rājā cakkavattī atthīti?
kv1.6:90.1: Atīto sammāsambuddho atthi, anāgato sammāsambuddho atthi, paccuppanno sammāsambuddho atthīti?
kv1.6:93.2: Hañci atītaṃ atthi, atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītanti.
kv1.6:93.5: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:94.1: No ce pana atītaṃ nvātītaṃ nvātītaṃ atītanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:94.2: “atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītan”ti.
kv1.6:94.5: ‘atītaṃ atthi atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītaṃ, tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:96.2: Hañci anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti.
kv1.6:96.5: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:97.1: No ce panānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ anāgatanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:97.2: “anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgatan”ti.
kv1.6:97.5: ‘anāgataṃ atthi atthi siyā anāgataṃ, siyā nvānāgataṃ, tenānāgataṃ nvānāgataṃ, nvānāgataṃ anāgatan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:98.4: Atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannanti.
kv1.6:99.2: Hañci paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti.
kv1.6:99.5: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:100.1: No ce pana paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:100.2: “paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannan”ti.
kv1.6:100.5: ‘paccuppannaṃ atthi atthi siyā paccuppannaṃ, siyā no paccuppannaṃ, tena paccuppannaṃ no paccuppannaṃ, no paccuppannaṃ paccuppannan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:101.4: Atthi siyā nibbānaṃ siyā no nibbānanti.
kv1.6:102.2: Hañci nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti.
kv1.6:102.5: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:103.1: No ce pana nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.6:103.2: “nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānan”ti.
kv1.6:103.5: ‘nibbānaṃ atthi atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā no nibbānaṃ, tena nibbānaṃ no nibbānaṃ, no nibbānaṃ nibbānan’”ti micchā.
kv1.6:105.5: “yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—
kv1.6:105.10: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā—
kv1.6:105.14: Tena hi atītaṃ atthi, anāgataṃ atthīti.
kv1.6:106.4: “tayome, bhikkhave, niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv1.6:106.6: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:106.7: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:106.12: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘ahosī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:106.13: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:107.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:107.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
kv1.6:107.7: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ ajātaṃ apātubhūtaṃ ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘bhavissatī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:107.8: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
kv1.6:108.1: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:108.2: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:108.7: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ jātaṃ pātubhūtaṃ ‘atthī’ti tassa saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassa samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassa paññatti;
kv1.6:108.8: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
kv1.6:108.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv1.6:109.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā, tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṃ na paṭikkositabbaṃ amaññiṃsu.
kv1.6:110.4: “atthi nu kho taṃ, bhante, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyāti.
kv1.6:110.5: Atthi nu kho sā, bhante, jivhā … pe …
kv1.6:110.7: atthi nu kho so, bhante, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.
kv1.6:111.1: “Natthi kho taṃ, phagguna, cakkhuṃ yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya.
kv1.6:111.2: Natthi kho sā, phagguna, jivhā … pe …
kv1.6:111.4: natthi nu kho so, phagguna, mano yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivatte paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.
kv1.6:112.4: “ahu pubbe lobho tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
kv1.6:112.6: ahu pubbe moho, tadahu akusalaṃ, so etarahi natthi, iccetaṃ kusalan”ti.
kv1.6:113.5: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā;
kv1.6:113.7: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ virūḷhaṃ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
kv1.6:113.8: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
kv1.6:113.9: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
kv1.6:113.10: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
kv1.6:113.11: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, sasokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, sarajaṃ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
kv1.6:114.3: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī … pe …
kv1.6:115.4: “kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī, natthi taṇhā;
kv1.6:115.6: Yattha viññāṇaṃ appatiṭṭhitaṃ avirūḷhaṃ, natthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
kv1.6:115.7: Yattha natthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, natthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi.
kv1.6:115.8: Yattha natthi saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhi, natthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
kv1.6:115.9: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti, natthi tattha āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ.
kv1.6:115.10: Yattha natthi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ, asokaṃ taṃ, bhikkhave, arajaṃ anupāyāsanti vadāmi.
kv1.6:116.3: viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre natthi rāgo, natthi nandī … pe …
